author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL STRENGTHENS BACK TO A CATEGORY 3 HURRICANE AS IT NEARS THE  YUCATAN PENINSULA...
summary:
...BERYL STRENGTHENS BACK TO A CATEGORY 3 HURRICANE AS IT NEARS THE  YUCATAN PENINSULA...
 As of 9:30 PM EDT Thu Jul 4
 the center of Beryl was located near 19.6, -85.1
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 962 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.
